resources.string:
a digit must occur at least once
 a lower case letter must occur at least once
 an upper case letter must occur at least once
 a special character must occur at least once
 no whitespace allowed in the entire string
 at least 8 characters

Our Image anaylsis tool rates the enviornmental impact of the chosen area.\n Simply Click this button from the wheel menuIand our tool wil analyse the photo taken!
If you wish to browse photos taken by other users simple click this button.
Is there anything better than a community working together for the common good?\n Those beaches could sure use a good clean up?\n Create your own clean up Event!
Not sure about creating your own event just yet?\n You can browse a list of clean-up event already organised and register to participate!
View/Change your profile picture, see your points or have a personalised view of all the events you are registered to !
See the average ratings of photos taken through a colour coded map. Red areas have presence of enviornmental damage!
If you wish to Log out or switch accounts click this icon!
